Moving **RIGHT** positions us further to the right, better for approaching other apples and maintaining mobility.

Between the two, **RIGHT** seems more promising because it continues along the current trajectory, offers more open space ahead, and keeps us aligned toward potentially reachable apples or safe paths.

I will choose to move **RIGHT** to keep options open and advance toward promising areas on the board.
